scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:test
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run check:type
scripts.check:type: npm run check:type:src && npm run check:type:test
scripts.check:type:test: npm run build && npm run check:type:test:tsc
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:zip
scripts.test: npm run test:unit:coverage && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:browser:headless && npm run test:browser:xvfb
scripts.test:browser:headless: npm run build && playwright test --config ./chrome-extension/playwright.config.ts --project browser-headless
scripts.test:browser:xvfb: npm run build && xvfb-run --auto-servernum --server-args='-screen 0 1920x1080x24' npx playwright test --config ./chrome-extension/playwright.config.ts --project browser-xvfb
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run check && npm run build && npm run test
